Summary: A whitish gray object moving in sky that disappered into clouds
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Antelope
There were no other sightings in Antelope on or around March 8th 2011
divs: sighting detailsit was about 12noon to 12:30 in antelope, ca. i was in my backyard playing with my kids. my 3 year old son noticed a beautiful hawk circling above us. as we admired this majestic hawk my son had pointed to the right of it and asked "what's that dot?" i looked up and automatically thought it was a ufo and not a balloon as it was not moving upwards. it was whitish gray with no lights that moved from left to right in a perfect stright line. we watched\followed it for about a minute as it moved in the sky and disappered into a sparse cloud. my son was quite disappointed when he could no longer find\see this object of fascination. he had described it to dad so perfectly when he asked "where did the golfball in the sky go?" i was in total shock as my son and i just witnessed our first ufo!
